com.tallygo.tallygoandroid.ui

Class LineDrawable

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.graphics.drawable.Drawable
      • com.tallygo.tallygoandroid.ui.LineDrawable

  • public class LineDrawable
extends android.graphics.drawable.Drawable
    A drawable with two colors, with the active color filling more of the drawable as a higher percent is set
